entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
